name: John Freedom: Escape from the Tower of Doom
overview: It was an ordinary day, and Johnny was about to came back home, after the 3Free Boys' concert. He was on his way home when something happened. A light burnt the cloudy sky, a thunder broke the silence of the valley, and the shadows of the moonlights quickly disappeared. High, on the top of the doomed mountain there was now the tower. He tried to fight, but they had him, and Johnny was kidnapped by the evil power of Sir Darkdoom. When he woke up, maybe many hours or may days later, he was alone in the shadows of his cell, looking for the way to freedom. Despite the name, the game is presented entirely in Italian.
